mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_system_scm_repository( SYSTEM_ID, SCM_TYPE, TOOL_ID, REPOSITORY_NAME, GIT_REPOSITORY_ID, STATUS, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{systemId}, #{scmType}, #{toolId}, #{repositoryName}, #{gitRepositoryId}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{lastUpdateBy}, #{lastUpdateDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT tssr.ID AS "id", concat(tssr.REPOSITORY_NAME,'(',tti.TOOL_NAME,')') AS "repositoryName", tti.IP AS "ip", tti.PORT AS "port", tti.CONTEXT AS "context", tti.ACCESS_PROTOCOL AS "accessProtocol" FROM tbl_system_scm_repository tssr LEFT JOIN tbl_tool_info tti ON tti.ID = tssr.TOOL_ID WHERE tssr.SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId} AND tssr.SCM_TYPE = #{scmType} AND tssr.STATUS = 1 AND tti.FUNCTION_TYPE = 1 AND tti.TOOL_TYPE = #{scmType} AND tti.STATUS = 1
SELECT FROM tbl_system_scm_repository WHERE SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId} AND STATUS = 1
SELECT FROM tbl_system_scm_repository WHERE ID = #{id} AND STATUS = 1
